warnings: Possible increased cancer risk in humans due to exposure to 4‑methylimidazole (4‑MeI), especially from Class IV caramel color E150d at high levels/No evidence of genotoxicity or reproductive toxicity in humans at typical dietary exposure, but high consumers (e.g. heavy cola drinkers or toddlers) could exceed ADI and carry greater risk of chronic exposure
